title: Day 16: Innovating with Cepuran, Dawson, Lehman and Mantia
description:
Fresh off their bronze in men's team pursuit,  Ethan Cepuran, Casey Dawson, Emery Lehman and Joey Mantia tell us how their innovative approach to aerodynamics, along clandestine pizza eating, led them to the podium.

Follow In The Village on Spotify for an inside look at the athlete life in Beijing, and watch all the Olympic action unfold on the networks of NBC.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
